forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7am. Mostly cloudy. High near 46, with temperatures falling to around 44 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. West northwest wind around 8 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 36. East northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow after 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Hey SK8TR BOIS: please try to keep your ski tips out of the classic tracks on Bucks Run. Instead, use that destructive energy to knock down the little berm the groomer leaves for you on the skate deck - thanksClassic skiers: the man made snow is fast and there is good grip with fish scales going up the “hill” - enjoy!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track.
nubsNob.comments: It's a beautiful start to the day a light wind and a clear sky. The grooming looks excellent and the snow is in good shape. The temperature is forecast to go slightly above freezing this afternoon. Pintail Peak is now open. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is broccoli cheddar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
